allow: Bash(do sed -i '' 's/^parent:/before:/g; s/^preconditions:/after:/g; s/^type: epic$/type: feature/g' "$f")

Bash(mont distill punctual-rottweiler --tasks='- id: next-detect-completion
  title: Detect last completed task from jj history
  description: Walk back jj revision history to find the most recent commit that changed a task status to complete. Return the completed task ID.
- id: next-identify-unblocked
  title: Identify tasks unblocked by completion
  description: Use the TaskGraph after transitive reduction to find tasks that were directly blocked by the completed task and are now ready \(all blockers complete\).
  after:
    - next-detect-completion
- id: next-annotate-display
  title: Annotate and boost next tasks in list/ready output
  description: Update mont list and mont ready to clearly mark ""next"" tasks \(recently unblocked by the last completion\) with a visual indicator. Boost task groups containing ""next"" items higher in mont list output.
  after:
    - next-identify-unblocked')
